overview:
Swimming pool supplies have been his passion since early childhood. Romnie Larson was born in sunny California, where swimming pools are common to all neighborhoods.

When Romnie was 5 years old, he fell into a swimming pool while his parents were not around. Luckily, a hard swimming pool cover was spread above the swimming pool, and Romnie survived.

In 1995 Romnie Larson graduated from Argosy University and got a degree in Business and Administration.

In 2001 he started his company, Pure Pool, which now specializes in swimming pool supplies, from pool covers to robotic pool cleaners.
